In England, in the seven days to 12 April, there were 16,346 new confirmed cases (29.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 April, there were 17,117 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (771 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 April is 3,832,788 (6,809.4 cases per 100,000 population).
